facebook.summary: University of Toronto Study Says Taking Selfies Makes You Think You’re Hotter Than You Really Are

facebook.title: Science, Critical Thinking and Skepticism
facebook.summary:
A new study out of the University of Toronto published in the journal Social Psychological and Personality Science found that selfie photos of individuals were judged as less attractive, less likable and more narcissistic than photos taken by others.
